name: Deadstick Landing
overview: DEADSTICK LANDING by Al Ragsdale Atari translation by Al Johnston Can you land the world's fastest glider — the Space Shuttle Orbiter? You must in this complex simulation. The author included his calculations from a Master's thesis in Avionics Instrumentation. Good luck — you'll need it! Game published in SoftSide Magazine Issue 50 11/1982.
